                                   ProtocolError, KeyError, Defect, OverflowError,
                                   LibraryError, CsvError], tags: [ReadIOEffect,
    WriteIOEffect, RootEffect, TimeEffect, ReadDirEffect].}
Stream Read URL to CSV to a list of dictionaries. This is very similar to pandas.read_csv(url).
